segments.text: Susan , good evening . Why are you so dressed up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am on my way out to a New Year ’ s banquet . How do I look ? Is my make-up OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You look great . Your make-up is perfect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think I should wear a different dress ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the one you have on looks fabulous , especially with your hair like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for saying . Do you have any ideas which necklace I should wear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With that dress I'd say your white diamond necklace would look perfect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for helping out . Now that I ’ m ready , what are you doing tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much , just a house party with some friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , most of the people are from our office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds Like I'm missing out on a good time . Oh , well , there is always next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure you ’ ll have fun no matter where you go . Remember to take your bag .
segments.speaker: S1
